      • createMilestone

        public static boolean createMilestone(Student student,
                      double goal,
                      java.util.Date deadline,
                      Query query,
                      Parser parser,
                      ParseField parseField,
                      ComparativeOperator operator)
        Creates a new milestone.
        Parameters:
        student - The student who creates the milestone.
        goal - The value the requested parameter needs to reach.
        deadline - The deadline for the milestone
        operator - The inequality you want to reach.
        query - The query that will be performed to fetch the data the milestone will use
        queryParser - The query parser that will be used to retrieve the value of the requested parameter.
        parseField - The parse field that will be used to retrieve a value for the data
        Returns:
        A boolean which is true if the creation of the milestone succeeded.
